Name: Halloween Puzzles
About the game: Halloween Puzzles. Itâ€˜s a clever and colorful learning experience. Puzzles are a challenging young minds, teaching and preparing them early in life some very important life skills. Whether you love puzzles with ghosts to goblins, witches and black cats. FEATURES: - A lot of beautiful and high-quality photos - Teaches cognitive skills, fine motor skills, patience and ability to focus - Option of quantity from 2 to 1000 jigsaw pieces - Relaxes your mind - More Than 80 Puzzles to Exercise Your Mind - Halloween puzzling atmosphere. - Traditional puzzle gameplay. - Simple controls make it easy to solve picture!
